TABLE.NAME: quiz_report_archiver_jobs
TABLE.COMMENT: Job status table for quiz archiver jobs

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: UUID of the job. Assigned by the archive worker.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this job is associated with

FIELD.NAME: cmid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course module this job is associated with

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz this job is associated with

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the user that initiated this job

FIELD.NAME: wstoken
FIELD.COMMENT: Webservice token that is allowed to write this job via the Moodle API

FIELD.NAME: artifactfileid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the artifact file from {files}, if present in Moodle storage

FIELD.NAME: artifactfilechecksum
FIELD.COMMENT: Content hash of the artifact file, if present in Moodle storage

TABLE.NAME: quiz_report_archiver_files
TABLE.COMMENT: Assigns temporary Moodle files to quiz archiver jobs

FIELD.NAME: jobid
FIELD.COMMENT: Internal ID of the job inside quiz_report_archiver_jobs table

FIELD.NAME: pathnamehash
FIELD.COMMENT: Pathnamehash (SHA1) of the file that is associated with the job
